about.about-text: I am a front-end web developer looking for my first professional opportunity in the field. I have solid knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, acquired through personal projects that demonstrate my ability to create intuitive and functional interfaces. I am a quick learner with an intuitive approach to problem-solving, always striving to improve my skills and provide effective solutions in web application development.

projects.desc-MOVIES-API: Movie API library, with description, rating, and image, using REACT and the TMDB API.
projects.desc-RESTAURANT: Restaurant menu using REACT for learning .map() and .filter().
projects.desc-GELATERIA: Gelateria made with REACT for learning SPA.
